Q: What should we know about this virus and how fast is it spreading?

Q: Are face masks effective?
Face masks are only one barrier. A more prudent approach to avoiding infections is simple: wash you hands thoroughly with soap and water!

Q: Is there a cure?
A: There is no cure and there are no proven therapies to combat the infection. But at least one hospital has begun a clinical trial assessing promising drug therapies.
